alert.note: Alert for Harvey (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 22 at 4:55PM CDT until June 22 at 6:00PM CDT by NWS Wichita
info.description: The National Weather Service in Wichita has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Harvey County in south central Kansas... * Until 600 PM CDT. * At 454 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Bentley, or near Sedgwick, moving northeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...70 mph wind gusts and ping pong ball size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect considerable tree damage. Wind damage is also likely to mobile homes, roofs, and outbuildings. * Locations impacted include... Newton, Hesston, Halstead, North Newton, Sedgwick, Burrton, Walton and Newton Airport. This includes Interstate 135 between Mile Markers 23 and 43. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.50 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
